This Project investigates the most important match statistics in tennis match outcomes across the atp 2024 season using R. 

## Files 

- **Tennis Statistics Analysis.R** - Script for data cleaning, visualisations and modelling. 
- **Determining which statistics have the most significant influence on tennis match outcomes** - A word document report of the analysis. 
- **atp_matches_2024.csv ** - Data file used for analysis.
